q: Oregon, told the Washington Post that the timing of Gabrielle Giffords opening her eyes was a good sign and sees a positive prognosis for the Congresswoman. "It's very significant," told the Post. In someone like her, who in just a few days after injury is opening her eyes and following commands, it is a much better prognostic indicator of recovery. It's less meaningful when it happens three or six months later. Two of Gabrielle Giffords 's colleagues and friends, Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand of New York and Representative Debbie Wasserman Schultz of Florida, were with the Congresswomen at the time when she first opened her eyes, and called the moment miraculous

Ben Smith: Mike Pence 's mom says he'll announce plans tomorrow Indiana Rep. Mike Pence 's mother tells the National Journal that he'll announce a decision on his his political future tomorrow: Rep. Mike Pence , R-Ind., is set to announce a decision on his political future on Friday, according to his mother, who has been urging him to finally put an end to all of the building speculation over his political future. coupons statement Thursday, Google's Eric Schmidt , announced that he will hand over the title of chief executive to Google co-founder Larry Page in April. In a message sent out on Twitter, Eric Schmidt said: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed! Eric Schmidt , a tech industry veteran who was brought in 10 years ago to provide what some at the company called "adult supervision" for Google's young founders, will take on the role of executive chairman,
